info: This gear has an <info>alarm clock</info> feature.
This clothing won't hinder special attacks that involve <info>mutated anatomy</info>.

description: This gear is equipped with an accurate barometer (which is used to measure atmospheric pressure).
This item can be clipped on to a <info>belt loop</info> of the appropriate size.
Layer for backpacks and things worn over outerwear.
info: This gear is <info>strapped</info> onto you.

description: Blinds the wearer while worn, and provides nominal protection vs flashbang flashes.
info: This gear <bad>prevents</bad> you from <info>seeing</info> anything.
This item can be used to block attacks when worn.
This piece of clothing has a <info>wide collar</info> that can keep your mouth warm if it is unencumbered.
This gear <bad>prevents</bad> you from <info>hearing any sounds</info>.
This item has a <good>diamond coating</good> improving it's <info>cutting damage</info>.
This gear <good>completely protects</good> you from <info>electric discharges</info>.

description: Wearing this clothing gives a morale bonus if the player has the Stylish trait.
info: This piece of clothing is <info>fancy</info>.

description: Zombie-dropped clothing giving various penalties if Filthy mod is active.
info: This piece of clothing is <bad>filthy</bad>.

description: Used for eyes protection from flashbang.

info: This clothing <info>prevents going underwater</info> including both <good>drowning</good> and <bad>diving</bad>.
This gear is <bad>fragile</bad> and <info>won't protect you for long</info>.
This gear <good>completely protects</good> you from <info>any gas</info>.
This piece of clothing has a <info>hood</info> to keep your head warm if your head is unencumbered.

description: This gear is equipped with an accurate hygrometer (which is used to measure humidity).
This item is a component of the gun it is attached to.  It can't be removed without destroying it.
Item can never be used with a CVD machine.
Don't offer to draw items from this holster when the fire key is pressed whilst the player's hands are empty.
Prevents repairing of this item even if otherwise suitable tools exist.
Outer garment layer.
info: This gear is generally <info>worn over</info> clothing.

description: Can always be worn no matter encumbrance/mutations/bionics/etc., but prevents any other clothing being worn over this.
info: This clothing is large enough to accommodate <info>mutated anatomy</info>.
This gear <good>reduces</good> the volume of <info>sounds</info> to a safe level.

description: Increases warmth for hands if the player's hands are cold and the player is wielding nothing.
info: This clothing has <info>pockets</info> to warm your hands when you are wielding nothing.
This clothing <good>completely protects</good> you from <info>radiation</info>.
This clothing <good>partially protects</good> you from <info>radiation</info>.

description: Prevents the covered body-part(s) from getting wet in the rain.
info: This piece of clothing is designed to keep you <info>dry</info> in the rain.

description: Prevents the player from wielding a weapon two-handed, forcing one-handed use if the weapon permits it.
This item can be stored in a sheath of the appropriate size.
This item can be stored in a scabbard of the appropriate size.
Undergarment layer.
info: This clothing <info>lies close</info> to the skin.
This clothing will <good>protect</good> you from harm and withstand <info>a lot of abuse</info>.

description: Prevents glaring when in sunlight.
info: This clothing keeps the <info>glare</info> out of your eyes.

description: Gives an additional moral bonus over FANCY if the player has the Stylish trait.
info: This clothing is <info>very fancy</info>.

description: Allows you to see much further under water.
info: This clothing allows you to <good>see much further</good> <info>under water</info>.

description: This gear is equipped with an accurate thermometer (which is used to measure temperature).
info: This gear is equipped with an <info>accurate thermometer</info>.

description: Can be made to fit via tailoring.
Layer for belts and other things worn on the waist.
info: This gear is worn on or around your <info>waist</info>.

description: Acts as a watch and allows the player to see actual time.
info: This gear allows to see <info>actual time</info>.

description: Prevents the covered body-part(s) from getting wet in any circumstance.
info: This clothing <info>won't let water through</info>.  Unless you jump in the river or something like that.

description: Prevents the item from making the body part count as unfriendly to water and thus causing negative morale from being wet.
info: This clothing <good>performs well</good> even when <info>soaking wet</info>. This can feel good.
This clothing has a fur lining sewn into it to <good>increase</good> its overall <info>warmth</info>.
This gear has Kevlar inserted into strategic locations to <good>increase protection</good> with some <bad>increase to encumbrance</bad>.
This gear has certain parts padded with leather to <good>increase protection</good> with moderate <bad>increase to encumbrance</bad>.
This clothing has a wool lining sewn into it to <good>increase</good> its overall <info>warmth</info>.

description: Allows wielding with unarmed fighting styles and trains unarmed when used.
info: This weapon <good>can be used with</good> <info>unarmed fighting styles</info>.

description: This bionic is a <bad>faulty</bad> bionic.
This bionic is a power source bionic.
This bionic only has a function when activated, else it causes it's effect every turn.
This bionic is a gun bionic and activating it will fire it.  Prevents all other activation effects.
This bionic is a weapon bionic and activating it will create (or destroy) bionic's fake_item in user's hands.  Prevents all other activation effects.
This bionic can provide power to powered armor.
